name: Carbon Guerrilla
overview:
Carbon Guerrilla offer online carbon accounting backed up by professional environmental consultants. For complete compliance in the UK’s Carbon Reduction Commitment energy efficiency scheme (CRC or now CRCEES). Carbon Guerrilla offer complete carbon accounting service from data collection, data entry and complete reporting tools. Inexpensive, easy to use - complete control of your carbon emissions. The software will enable your organisation to be completely CRC compliant. Carbon Guerrilla’s software also follows the international standards for voluntary reporting - ISO 14064 and Bilane Carbone.

Carbon Guerrilla offer organisations help and assistance to start reporting and managing their carbon emissions. It will cover both voluntary carbon reporting and legislation led carbon compliance. At the current time CRCEES is on many organisations minds. CG will help you:

  1. Register or make declaration for CRC. Deadlines for registration end on 30th September 2010.
  2. Advise on Early Action Measures to help improve your position in the published league tables.
  3. Help your organisation find access to the relevant data and assist uploading it into the CG software.
  4. Show how CG can be used as a business management tool - giving your organisation a real return on investment.
  5. Manage and issue reports for compliance and ultimately reduce your carbon emissions.

Carbon Guerrilla provide a cloud based carbon accounting tool. Giving companies full control over their Carbon Management strategy. Full CRCEES or Voluntary carbon reporting. This software is much more than a carbon footprint calculator, it is a business management tool. It shows where real cost savings can be seen across an organisation - giving real return on investment. Carbon Guerrilla is easy to use and inexpensive to implement backed up by very experienced environmental consultants.
